channel.title: Community building
channel.description:
As a server we should defiantly be doing more community based builds for everyone, for example general public farms, houses at spawn - the kind of thing that makes someone feel welcomed on a server.
Me and some other people (mainly fuscate) were talking about starting a project near or at spawn in the jungle involving everyone who would meet a simple criteria (your buildings have to look nice).
So basically we have a vision of lots of houses at spawn like a little spawn town which the community would build, you could build a house for yourself and then leave and go and build your own base - a lot like hermitcraft if anyone's seen that. In the town we could have the general farms much like we had in the old world 1 spawn with the tree farm.
Obviously we don't want lots of little dirt houses popping up in the village so if this plan works and you decide to build in the town and your house looks bad we will give you a chance to modify it or remove it... Theres gonna be problems with greifing which I have no idea on how to resolve so if you have any suggestions on that then I'd be willing to read. The obvious fix is to have a mod go and rollback damage each day but that could be a pain for them.
I know that this sounds a bit sketchy and a waste of your minecraft career but think about how good it will make the spawn look!
Our current spawn is very ugly and to be honest if I were a new player I would leave straight away after seeing it:
[img]http://img542.imageshack.us/img542/4899/20120811112955.png[/img]
[u]House guidelines[/u] Because we want this to look nice I'm gonna say that the following building materials/methods are not welcome in the town when we build this:
Cobblestone boxes - you can use cobblestone but don't overuse it or make sure it looks decent. A box made with one material from top to bottom. Dirt houses. Houses without windows. Don't build box houses - they must have shape. Half cut down trees!!!
When you build you are also responsible for any garden area or paths leading to your house.
[u]Progress[/u] 14/8/12 - [img]http://img834.imageshack.us/img834/1495/20120814000252.png[/img]
24/8/12 - [img]http://img228.imageshack.us/img228/8150/20120824165135.png[/img] [img]http://img138.imageshack.us/img138/1240/20120824163141.png[/img] [img]http://img715.imageshack.us/img715/9404/20120824163209.png[/img] [img]http://img259.imageshack.us/img259/180/20120824163131.png[/img]
[u]The nether[/u] We should also create a main nether hub connected to the town in which you can then tunnel of to your own portals that take you to your base/ house. This is not important right away but it would be nice to see it done.
Post your opinions below...

item.title: Community building
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

[quote=“kickingjamie, post:17, topic:453831”][quote author=Si Force link=topic=556673.msg4106722#msg4106722 date=1348078414]
Oh, I forgot about this. I intend on building a spleef arena around the spawn somewhere in the near future, I just have to get the time first.
[/quote]
Awesome, before you build it could you show me where in case it interferes with plans?[/quote]

Will do, do you have big plans for the spawn?

[quote=“omgilikepie, post:16, topic:453831”][quote author=Si Force link=topic=556673.msg4106722#msg4106722 date=1348078414]
Oh, I forgot about this. I intend on building a spleef arena around the spawn somewhere in the near future, I just have to get the time first.
[/quote]

congrats on finding right topic :)[/quote]

Thanks, I try. :rolleyes:

Read full topic

Oh, I forgot about this. I intend on building a spleef arena around the spawn somewhere in the near future, I just have to get the time first.
[/quote]

congrats on finding right topic

I still have an idea of something I want to do, just have to think it through more and gather resources[/quote]
Build whenever you want, just show me or fuscate where first

item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

xxx123xxx:

Is this still open for anyone to join and put an effort to create something nice at spawn?

Yep, as long as it looks good go ahead and build

item.title: Community building
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

Thanks for the input, hopefully this project goes ahead soon and doesn’t get dragged out for ages.

EDIT: I need to know what we’re allowed to do when it comes to destroying houses at spawn…

Read full topic

item.title: Community building
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

I agree, and will help if I’m on. The area around spawn is the first thing people see when they join the server, so if they see it looks like shit, they either leave, or decide to go make it look worse lol

Read full topic

item.title: Community building
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

Agreed, I’ll put down some main No’s in the main post.

Read full topic

item.title: Community building
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

I think we also need to set general guidelines on wich materials to use when building a house near spawn, or better yet wich materials NOT to use.

Read full topic

item.title: Community building
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

I wouldn’t have a problem building a house of my own there, and I’m sure we can knock down all the abandoned shacks. The only problem are the people who currently live and actively play in ugly houses in the spawn. I feel that we can either give them resources to build their house elsewhere or ask them to improve their households substantially.

Read full topic

item.title: Community building
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

Hmm, a lot of them shacks that are built there are abandoned and if theirs any active players living there we could ask them to move?

Obviously the staff would need to give us permission to destroy the crap that’s already there.

Read full topic

item.title: Community building
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

What about the houses crap already build there?

Read full topic

item.title: Community building
item.dc:creator: @noodleman_jr noodleman jr
item.description:
@noodleman_jr wrote:

i like the idea and will help

Read full topic

item.title: Community building
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

I love the idea of a community town where everyone puts a little bit of them self into a large scale project. In my opinion we should try and hold a certain criteria on your own house (has to look visually pleasing, nice on all texture packs not just a single one) etc. A good point to hold is that as a community town, we will hopefully have staff building there aswell and therefore being able to monitor grief and be able to roll it back almost as it comes.

I am more than willing to put a large amount of time into this project and i am sure there are a number of others who will also, so this has my full support and I hope to see it go far.

Read full topic
